faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How can I book a service from the platform?
faq.a1: Browse the categories, choose the appropriate service, then click 'Book Now' and follow the instructions to complete the reservation
faq.q2: Do I need to create an account to make a reservation?
faq.a2: Yes, you must be logged in to your account so that we can link bookings to you and provide appropriate support
faq.q3: Can I cancel my reservation after payment?
faq.a3: Yes, but depending on the service provider's policy. Some services are cancelable with a partial or full refund within a specified period
faq.a4: We accept payments via credit cards, Apple Pay, STC Pay, and bank transfer for some plans
faq.q5: How can I contact the service provider?
faq.a5: After booking, you'll see a 'Contact Provider' button on your booking page. You can contact us directly

plans.choosePlan: Choose the right plan for you
